title: SIMPLE MINDS LISEBERGSHALLEN GOTHENBURG, SWEDEN 2015-03-16
description:
SIMPLE MINDS LISEBERGSHALLEN GOTHENBURG, SWEDEN 2015-03-16


MASTER RECORDING

Artist: SIMPLE MINDS
Date: 2015.03.16 (March 16th 2015)
Location: GOTHENBURG, SWEDEN
Venue: LISEBERGSHALLEN
Source: Aud
Lineage: H2Zoom > CD > YOU
Artwork: No
Time: CD 1 - 62:58 min & CD 2 - 63:56 min
Sound Quality: 4 (out of 5)

SetList:
--------

10. Love Song
11. Rivers Of Ice*
12. Dolphins

14. DonÃ‚Â´t You (Forget About Me)

CD 2 -
01. Book Of Brilliant Things**
02. East Of Easter**
03. Once Upon A Time
04. All The Things She Said
05. Let There Be Love
06. Let It All Come Down
07. Someone, Somewhere In Summertime

Notes:

* = Lead vocals by Catherine A.D.
** = Lead vocals by Sarah Brown

Simple Minds indoor show in Gothenburg for the first time in many
years, I think it was 1991 since the last time, but I can be wrong.

Since it was a Monday night, not that many people showed up but the
band put on a brilliant show. They had a brilliant sound aswell.

The show was split into two set with a pause of 15 min in between
and during the first set (CD 1), "Catherine" was the female singer and
during the second set (CD 2), "Sarah Brown" was the female singer.
"Catherine" came up during "Sanctify Yourself" and stayed the rest of
the show
